text:
@narendramodi During global pandemic,a strong leadership is warranted.🇮🇳 is fortunate to hv such driving force who can put nation in right direction with composure. 

I wud rqst @PMOIndia to hv virtual conf with all state & UT heads CMs,Governors,LGs urge for 💯 lockdown & tk stock of measures https://t.co/Z6sIidEnvt
